ygData.subject: Re: Yield Policy
ygData.msgSnippet: First come First Served YA RIGHT !!!!! So Mik and  Mystic  If that s your idea of fairness  then the next time a level 50 wizard shows up and nukes a mob  my
ygData.messageBody:
First come First Served

YA RIGHT !!!!!

So Mik and Mystic If that's your idea of fairness then the next time a
level 50 wizard shows up and nukes a mob my group has been camping for
hours , should I tell them "Mik says its first com first served" and to go
away. Think about it.

----- Original Message -----
From: Mystik <mystik@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, September 12, 1999 6:48 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Yield Policy


> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> mik, i agree wholeheartedly....there are items i'd like to get as well,
because
> i wason't able or didn't know about them till the mobs wouldn't give me
> exp....seems the fair thing to do is what you said...<paraphrased> first
come,
> first serve
>
> (\/)ystix
>
> Mikaela wrote:
>
> > From: "Mikaela" <mikaela1@...>

think
